Panzer::
She tried to struggle, but quickly found it useless. The dragon had 
too strong a grip on her.  She tired her last ditch effort. She 
opened her comlink. A small wire popped out of her ear and went down 
infront of her mouth. She called out on every maximal frequency. She 
knew she'd only have a few seonds to transmit before they stopped 
her. "Maximal Scout Panzer needs assistance in the Black Fortress! 
Will be reprogrammed in minutes! Please assist!REPEAT! MAXIMAL NEEDS 
HELP IN THE BLACK FORTRESS!" She prayed to the matrix that some bot 
out there heard her and would get here in time. 





--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Shivah::
> 
> "I like to speak about our problem... " said Shivah "But I have to 
> solve some details before" Shivah typed some buttons and Blaze with 
> Silver scout were locked down and insolated, in that way that the 
> virus couldnt spread out side the area where they were.
> 
> "Bullet"said Shivah By comm link "I need your help. I promise you a 
> lot fun, 'cause we have a annoying bot in our territory and you 
could 
> have the chance to destroy him, follow my signal"
> 
> "Now my dear Panzer"said Shivah while he looked to the 
maximal "It's 
> time for your reprogramation process... Come my brothers, Kit kat 
and 
> Drillbit"
> 
> Shivah walked to the labs, while Luzbel (With Panzer in arms) and 
> attila follow him.
